skillTree.localised_description: Chaos Dragons are anathema to the noble beasts of Caldor. They are now corrupted creatures ridden by malicious Lords.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.
At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Dining upon the blood of slaughtered enemies may attract the notice, and maybe the favour, of the Hound.
The Great Hound of War thirsts eternally for blood and slaughter, its rage manifesting itself in the unstoppable martial spirit of its warriors.
A grim currency that fuels his unstoppable ascent.
The Fly Lord and his devotees despise Tzeentch, for his obsession with schemes and trickery are the polar opposite of Nurgle's delight in slow, musty stagnation.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Tzeentchian factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: In the heat of battle, Lord Slaurith and his warriors become an unstoppable storm of carnage, fueled by Khorne's unrelenting rage

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Lord Slaurith revels in the art of collecting gruesome trophies from fallen foes
Khorne's infernal blessings have turned Lord Slaurith into an indomitable force, shrugging off blows that would fell lesser mortals
Lord Slaurith's once noble kin, the Knights of the Blazing Sun, now serve Khorne's insatiable lust for battle. His leadership inspires fellow knights as they embrace the dark path to glory.

effects.description:
Attribute: Ogre Charge for Skullcrushers and Chaos Knights of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus

effects.description:
Charge Bonus: +20 for Skullcrushers and Chaos Knights of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Lord Slaurith's insatiable appetite for carnage and bloodshed empowers him

When the battle reaches its zenith, Lord Slaurith succumbs to the intoxicating call of the Blood God. In this blood-fueled frenzy, he becomes immune to control but at the cost of his safety, making him a whirlwind of destruction on the battlefield.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from their mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.
Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Feet of Khorne march across the corpses of their enemies, as the Teeth of Death crush the life from those yet to die.

skillTree.localised_description: Many armies are lost almost instantly under an avalanche of uninhibited, murderous rage. Such things are wondrous to behold.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
This Khornate Lord's well of eternal rage never runs dry, nor does the ceaseless influx of warriors eager to serve under his command.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.
This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: There is no stopping this one's slaughter, for they are driven by the unquenchable lust for battle.
Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Pure, irrepressible rage is but an act of worship to the Blood God's glory.
This brutal Lord of Khorne decimates the lands of man and monster alike – the avatar or wrath incarnate!

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

factionEffects.localised_description: Impatiently waiting his next challenger, Lord Slaurith seeks eternal glory on the steps of Bastion Stair.

effects.description: Ultimate Challenger: Hunt down your past fellow knights and sacrifice them to Khorne for significant bonuses!
